mapper.select: SELECT ID, NAME, BRAND_ID AS brandId, PRICE, COLOR, DESCRIPTION, CATEGORY, STYLE, FIT, SEASON, IMAGE_URL AS imageUrl FROM PRODUCT

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT P.ID, P.NAME, P.IMAGE_URL AS imageUrl, B.BRAND_NAME AS BRAND, DSB.FLOOR, P.PRICE FROM PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN BRAND B ON P.BRAND_ID = B.ID LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT_STORE_BRAND DSB ON P.BRAND_ID = DSB.BRAND_ID LEFT JOIN RECOMMEND_RESULT R ON P.ID = R.TARGET_ID WHERE R.SOURCE_ID = #{productId} ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
